title: Elizaes memoriall. King Iames his arriuall. And Romes downefall
author: Nixon, Anthony.
publisher: Printed T[homas] C[reede] for Iohn Baylie, and are to be sold at his shop neare the litle north doore of Paules,
notes: Dedication signed: A.N., i.e. Anthony Nixon.
